snippet: Ms. Perry’s new single, “Roar,” sold 557,000 copies in its first week out, but Robin Thicke’s “Blurred Lines” held the top spot for another week.
abstract: Ms. Perry’s new single, “Roar,” sold 557,000 copies in its first week out, but Robin Thicke’s “Blurred Lines” held the top spot for another week.

headline.main: Big Sales for Katy Perry, But 'Blurred Lines' Reigns at No. 1
headline.print_headline: Big Sales for Katy Perry, But ‘Blurred Lines’ Rules
